languages.text: {n}Переждав первую волну изумленных вскриков, Абеляр бросает на вас взгляд — и продолжает:{/n} "По праву кровной преемственности и за отсутствием иных родичей, способных опротестовать сие решение..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Переждав первую волну изумленных вскриков, Абеляр бросает на вас взгляд — и продолжает:{/n} "По праву кровной преемственности и за отсутствием иных родичей, способных опротестовать сие решение..."

languages.text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."
languages.original_text: {n}Переждав первую волну изумленных вскриков, Абеляр бросает на вас взгляд — и продолжает:{/n} "По праву кровной преемственности и за отсутствием иных родичей, способных опротестовать сие решение..."

traits.locale_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."
{n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."
{n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."
{n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."
{n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德等待第一波震惊的呼声结束，之后瞥了你一眼，继续开了口。{/n}“由于当下并没有任何亲族可以质疑这个决定，根据血缘继承权……”
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德等待第一波震惊的呼声结束，之后瞥了你一眼，继续开了口。{/n}“由于当下并没有任何亲族可以质疑这个决定，根据血缘继承权……”

languages.text: {n}Después de esperar a que pase la primera oleada de gritos de sorpresa, Abelard te mira de reojo y continúa.{/n} «Por derecho de sucesión sanguínea y en ausencia de otros familiares que puedan objetar esta decisión...».
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de esperar a que pase la primera oleada de gritos de sorpresa, Abelard te mira de reojo y continúa.{/n} «Por derecho de sucesión sanguínea y en ausencia de otros familiares que puedan objetar esta decisión...».

languages.text: {n}衝撃的な叫びの第一波が収まるのを待ち、アベラルドはあなたをちらっと見て、続ける。{/n}「血統継承の権利により、そしてこの決定に異議を唱えることができる他の親族の不在により…」
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}衝撃的な叫びの第一波が収まるのを待って、アベラルドはあなたをちらっと見て、続ける。{/n}「血俗継承の権利により、そしてこの決定に異議を唱えることができる他の親族の不在により…」
{n}衝撃的な叫びの第一波が収まるのを待ち、アベラルドはあなたをちらっと見て、続ける。{/n}「血統継承の権利により、そしてこの決定に異議を唱えることができる他の親族の不在により…」

languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

languages.text: {n}Une fois la première vague de cris et de pleurs passée, Abélard vous lance un regard, puis reprend :{/n} « Par droit du sang et en l'absence d'autres membres de la famille en position de contester cette décision... »
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fois la première vague de cris et de pleurs passée, Abélard vous lance un regard, puis reprend :{/n} « Par droit du sang et en l'absence d'autres membres de la famille en position de contester cette décision... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard wartet die erste Welle schockierter Aufschreie ab, blickt dann dich an und fährt fort:{/n} "Gemäß des Rechts der Blutnachfolge und der Abwesenheit anderer Verwandter, die diese Entscheidung anfechten könnten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wartet die erste Welle schockierter Aufschreie ab, blickt dann dich an und fährt fort:{/n} "Gemäß des Rechts der Blutnachfolge und der Abwesenheit anderer Verwandter, die diese Entscheidung anfechten könnten ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, şaşkınlıkla dolu ilk tepkilerin yatışmasını bekledikten sonra sana bir bakış atıp devam ediyor.{/n} "Kan bağından doğan veraset hakkı ve karara itiraz edebilecek başka bir aile üyesi bulunmamasından dolayı..."
languages.original_text: {n}After waiting out the first wave of shocked cries, Abelard glances at you and continues,{/n} "By right of blood succession and with the absence of other kin who could challenge this decision..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, şaşkınlıkla dolu ilk tepkilerin yatışmasını bekledikten sonra sana bir bakış atıp devam ediyor.{/n} "Kan bağından doğan veraset hakkı ve karara itiraz edebilecek başka bir aile üyesi bulunmamasından dolayı..."
